comment: Mashed at 145 for an hour, then at 153 for another hour (4 gallons for the ~13.5 lbs of grain). Sparged at 200 degrees with 3 gallons of water over the course of an hour. Added homemade candi sugar (the darker one was closer to an amber candi sugar). SG was over 1.073 (didn't measure post-boil). Pitched yeast at ~65 degrees and kept the carboy at around ~65 during fermentation.
